tooltip.carbonado.base_blackDiamond: ยง7Also known as Black Diamond
tooltip.carbonado_glass.base_info: ยง8Stronger than normal Glass and prevents light from passing through
tooltip.carbonado_glass.base_createGlass: ยง7Drop an anvil from at least 4 blocks on a Carbonado to get Carbonado Shards, then smelt them ...
advancements.carbonado.root.title: Carbonado Mod
advancements.carbonado.carbonado.title: Stronger than Diamond
advancements.carbonado.carbonado.descrip: Obtain a Carbonado. Try checking inside Bedrock
advancements.carbonado.armor.title: Man in Black
advancements.carbonado.armor.description: Obtain a full set of Carbonado armor. Those can be created in an anvil with a Diamond armor piece and the right amount of Carbonado. Enchantments are kept but at a cost.
advancements.carbonado.sword.title: Not That Shiny, but Sharp
advancements.carbonado.sword.description: Obtain a Carbonado Sword. This can be created in an anvil with a Diamond Sword and the right amount of Carbonado. Enchantments are kept but at a cost.
advancements.carbonado.tools.title: Yep, the Hoe too
advancements.carbonado.tools.description: Obtain a full set of Carbonado Tools (yep, the Hoe too). Those can be created in an anvil with a Diamond tool and the right amount of Carbonado. Enchantments are kept but at a cost.
advancements.carbonado.hoe.title: Even More dedication
advancements.carbonado.shard.title: A Falling Anvil
advancements.carbonado.shard.description: Make an anvil fall on top of a Carbonado to obtain shards
advancements.carbonado.glass.title: Tinted Window
advancements.carbonado.glass.description: Melt the shards and use them to get Carbonado Reinforced Glass
